item.title: New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you
item.description:
New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you

Up until now, we've really only seen SpaceX's rocket landing in the middle of the ocean from afar. Chase planes near the drone ship provided a spectacular view of the milestone event, but now, S...

item.title: Sevenhugs' Smart Remote
item.description:
Sevenhugs' Smart Remote

Looking to simplify the endless number of apps and interfaces used to control smart-home products, French start-up Sevenhugs has introduced the first "contextually aware" universal Smart Remote. In other words, it's the first remote to understand where it is in your home and what it's pointing at, allowing users to simply point and click to control devices instead of switching between apps.

item.title: What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3
item.description:
What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3

HAWTHORNE, California - I've had a terrible flu all week. My body aches, my head is pounding, and my throat feels like it might fall out of my neck. Right now, though, I'm riding in the Tesla Model 3, one of the most hotly anticipated cars in the world...
